name: Mohammed Ashab Asir
review: Inner dimensions for the earpieces are 2 and 1/8' high, and a little over 1 and 1/2' wide. I have big ears and they barely fit. Otherwise and excellent headset so far.

name: Md Tanvir Ahmed
review: Excellent product, absolute value for money. Using this product for last 8 month and quality is suberb.I will recommand this product for every buyer.

name: Ismail Khan
review: Bit of a disappointed with the product as it does have a small wire. Which cause some problem with me. But overall sound quality is suberb and flexibility is top noch.

name: Mamun Rahman
review: Great product with a perfect pricing. Bass of this headset is one of the best I have ever used. Shipping was absolutely on time. Love this seller

name: Al Rashid
review: I bought a lot of headsets. I have to say the sound quality of it is better than average,not just for gaming but also listening to music. And the mic is really clear and it fits so comfortablely, really worth the price!!

name: Mahmud Uddin
review: I contacted Amazon this morning and they issued a full refund for the item. It's a non refundable item unfortunately as I found out after it was purchased. They will tell you to keep it, dispose of it, donate it, whatever you want to do with it but will refund you for the item.
